titleStmt.title: Reflections on two discourses concerning the divinity of our Saviour, written by Monsieur Lamoth in French, and done into English written to J.S.
titleStmt.author: Nye, Stephen, 1648?-1719.
E. E.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Stephen Nye by Wing (2nd ed.).
This item also appears as part of A Second collection of tracts ... London, 1693 (Wing S2267, at reel 1269:1).
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
